color_palette.rationale: Balances the 'Sovereign' security of Canadian data residency with the 'Cozy' warmth of a storybook fortress.

background_canvas.name: Warm Parchment
background_canvas.description: Replaces clinical white. Mimics the organic texture of high-quality paper or oatmeal.

primary_ink.name: Oxford Navy
primary_ink.description: Deep, authoritative blue. Used for the word 'Story' and main UI headers.

secondary_hearth.name: Terracotta Clay
secondary_hearth.description: Warm, earthen orange. Used for the word 'Fort', call-to-action buttons, and the castle masonry.

tertiary_growth.name: Cotswold Sage
tertiary_growth.description: Muted, dusty green. Used for floating hexagonal icons and 'correct' states.

highlight_spark.name: Antique Brass
highlight_spark.description: Metallic gold-yellow. Used for circuit traces and the 'Spark' of ideas.

logo_typeface.characteristics: Sturdy bracketed serifs, medium contrast, high x-height.

ui_typeface.rationale: Needs to be legible for children but retain the 'softness' of the logo.

visual_language.description: Clean vector lines with subtle pixel-art nuances, referencing the 'Unstickr' sprites.

textures.paper_grain: Subtle noise overlay (5-10% opacity) to simulate paper.
textures.matte_finish: No high-gloss reflections. Soft, diffused lighting.

shapes.hexagons: Represents the 'Hive' of ideas and the modular AI components.
shapes.circuits: Gold filigree lines connecting elements, representing the 'Process Scaffolding'.
shapes.fortress: Sturdy, thick-walled structures symbolizing safety and privacy.

buttons.primary: Terracotta background, rounded corners (8px), subtle drop shadow.
buttons.secondary: Oxford Navy border, transparent background, Navy text.

containers.card_style: Warm Parchment background, Oxford Navy stroke (2px), slight inner glow.

asset_generation_prompts.instruction: Use these descriptors when generating new assets to ensure consistency with the logo.
asset_generation_prompts.style_string: isometric vector art, storybook illustration style, warm parchment background #F2EAD3, matte texture, soft lighting, Oxford Navy and Terracotta color palette, educational yet magical, subtle circuit board patterns in gold
asset_generation_prompts.negative_prompt: neon, glossy, 3d render, photorealistic, harsh shadows, pure white background, cyberpunk, cold colors
